sentences.en: A dancer must throw herself heart and soul into every performance.
sentences.cn: 舞蹈演员对每一场演出都必须尽心尽力.

sentences.en: Cecile was in her early thirties, a sometime actress, dancer and singer.
sentences.cn: 塞茜尔三十出头，曾经做过演员、舞蹈演员和歌手。

sentences.en: He gestures, gesticulates, and moves with the grace of a dancer.
sentences.cn: 他举手投足之间流露出舞者的优雅。

sentences.en: He was kicking his legs like a Can Can dancer.
sentences.cn: 他像跳康康舞一样踢着腿。

sentences.en: He was the best dancer in LA.
sentences.cn: 他是洛杉矶舞跳得最好的人。
他是个非常有天赋的舞者。

sentences.en: Her performance as the dying dancer drew tears from the crowd.
sentences.cn: 她扮演那个将死去的舞蹈演员感动得大家流下了眼泪.

sentences.en: His previous girlfriend was a dancer with the Royal Ballet.
sentences.cn: 他的前女友是皇家芭蕾舞团的舞蹈演员。

sentences.en: Mary agreed to double the part of the dancer and the mother.
sentences.cn: 玛丽同意扮演舞女和母亲两个角色.

sentences.en: She is a pole dancer at London's famous Spearmint Rhino club.
sentences.cn: 她是伦敦著名的“薄荷犀牛”夜总会的钢管舞舞者。

sentences.en: She wants to be a ballet dancer .
The dancer wore a headdress of pink ostrich plumes.
sentences.cn: 那位舞蹈演员戴着粉色鸵鸟毛制作的头饰.
这个舞蹈演员舞技精湛。

sentences.en: Usually only a trained dancer can do the splits.
sentences.cn: 通常只有训练有素的舞蹈演员才会劈叉.

sentences.en: When I met Derek he was ever such a good dancer.
sentences.cn: 我认识德里克时，他是个非常出色的舞者。

words.tran_cn: 舞蹈家；舞蹈演员；舞女；跳舞者

trans.tran_cn: 跳舞者，舞蹈演员，舞女，舞蹈家
trans.tran_en: someone who dances as a profession
